tool_description: Modifies, adds, or removes specific DICOM tags while maintaining file integrity and standard compliance.

input_file_path.description: Path to the source DICOM file

output_file_path.description: Path where modified DICOM file will be saved

tags_to_modify.description: Array of tag modifications in format 'tag_id:new_value'

tags_to_remove.description: Array of DICOM tag IDs to remove

validate_modifications.description: Validate tag modifications against DICOM standards

error_messages: Invalid tag format: Use format 'XXXX,XXXX:value' for tag modifications (e.g., '0010,0010:ANONYMOUS').
Protected tag modification: Attempting to modify critical tags that could corrupt the file.
Invalid tag value: New tag value does not match expected data type or format for the tag.
File write error: Cannot save modified file to output path. Check permissions and disk space.
Tag validation failed: Modified tags do not conform to DICOM standards.
usage: Specify input and output file paths, then provide tags_to_modify or tags_to_remove arrays. Use validation options to ensure DICOM compliance.

tags_modified.description: List of tags that were successfully modified

tags_removed.description: List of tags that were successfully removed
